**Matrici**
: terreni, sedimenti

**Analiti**
: - Policlorodibenzodiossine (PCDD):
        - 2,3,7,8-TCDD,
        - 1,2,3,7,8-PeCDD,
        - 1,2,3,4,7,8-HxCDD,
        - 1,2,3,6,7,8-HxCDD,
        - 1,2,3,7,8,9-HxCDD,
        - 1,2,3,4,6,7,8-HpCDD,
        - OCDD;
 - Policlorodibenzofurani (PCDF):
        - 2,3,7,8-TCDF,
        - 1,2,3,7,8-PeCDF,
        - 2,3,4,7,8-PeCDF,
        - 1,2,3,4,7,8-HxCDF,
        - 1,2,3,6,7,8-HxCDF,
        - 2,3,4,6,7,8-HxCDF,
        - 1,2,3,7,8,9-HxCDF,
        - 1,2,3,4,6,7,8-HpCDF,
        - 1,2,3,4,7,8,9-HpCDF,
        - OCDF;
 - Sommatoria di policlorodibenzo-p-diossine/policlorodibenzofurani (PCDD/PCDF) come
tossicità equivalente I-TEQ da conversione I-TEF (calcolata);
 - Sommatoria di policlorodibenzodiossine/policlorodibenzofurani (PCDD/PCDF) come
tossicità equivalente OMS-TEQ (2005) (calcolata).
